overview: A feast for all the senses. Tracy Adams serves it up hot to Don Adams on the tennis court in this all-star sizzler. Between sets she shares strokes with a visiting niece, a traveling circus clown bent on juggling as many balls as she can fit into her schedule - and mouth! Neighbors Nina Hartley and Don Fernando lend their mixed doubles skills to the heated play - both on the court and getting off!
title: Playmate of the Mouth
